attributes.action: Stop exporting weapons to Saudi Arabia
attributes.additional_details: The UK Government has been arming the Saudi Arabian government, allowing them to continue this brutal regime and exacerbate the impacts of the famine in Yemen. British bombs are being used to create the greatest humanitarian crisis. What is happening in Yemen is appalling, sickening, immoral and unethical, and Britain should not be supporting this brutality by arming the Saudi Arabian state.
attributes.background: Yemen is facing one of the worst humanitarian crises since the Second World War, and the problems are directly related to the war being waged on Yemen by the Saudi Arabian government. The UK is supporting this humanitarian crisis by exporting weapons to Saudia Arabia. This needs to stop.
